interactivity.requirements: Friday You must be on at least Day  558 to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Grief Seed " Seen " Chiburi " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Too Blind To See " from Futaba Fukuyama Seen " Uta-chan " from Uta Ushibori Seen " Bad News Bears " from Chinami Chosokabe Seen " A Hairline Fracture " from Imani Imai
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Friday on or after Day 558. This starts the Halloween Dorm Wars chain-event.

progression.synopsis: Ayane and Uta announce the contest for the second Dorm Wars and Sensei is allowed to stay during the announcement of the contest and match-ups this time. Ayane tries again to make everyone aware of the time loop, but Sensei tells her that everyone will see the truth once they’re on the rooftop after he prepared everyone for it , much to Maya ’s annoyance. With that out of the way, Ayane and Uta announce the contests, but remind them that the competitions and time schedules for the second day are still incomplete.
trivia: If Sensei does not have at least 25 Haruka Lust and 25 Sara Lust and hasn't seen Engulfed , triggering this Event will fail Secret Weapon !
If Sensei does not have at least 25 Chika Lust , triggering this Event will fail Mating Season !

If Sensei does not have at least 30 Kirin Lust and 10 Miku Lust , triggering this Event will fail Falling Asleep Standing Up ! There's another requirement for this event, but this requirement is tied to a choice in the event chain.
There's another requirement for this event, but this requirement is tied to a choice in the event chain.

Two chain events will occur directly after this one concludes. As such, the player must also complete the following requirements before the start of this event. If Sensei does not have at least 50 Makoto Lust and 50 Futaba Lust , triggering this event will guarantee that Toys is missed! If Sensei does not have at least 35 Ami Lust , triggering this event will guarantee that No One Can Hear Us is missed!
